Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Relocation Assistance Offered Within Region
# 152230 - Hustopece, Jihomoravský kraj, Czech Republic
Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Description:
Groupon is an experienced marketplace that brings people more ways to get the most out of their city or wherever they may be. By enabling real-time mobile commerce across local businesses, live events, and travel destinations, Groupon helps people find and discover experiences––big and small, new and familiar––that make for a full, fun, and rewarding life. Groupon helps local businesses grow and strengthen customer relationships––resulting in strong, vibrant communities. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking, and celebrates success.
Are you a passionate, energetic technology enthusiast eager to work at a rapid pace with the flexibility to work across a broad tech stack? Are you a problem solver; someone who enjoys debugging code, resolving issues, and creating solutions for exciting problems?
The Data Ingestion team at Groupon is at the heart of all things “data”, working on defining and building the next-generation cloud-based solutions to ingest and curate petabytes of data into our data lake. Our mission is to empower data analysts & data scientists across all business units to make better business decisions. This role offers a unique combination of skills in computer science (distributed systems, big data) and scalable, high-performance production systems.

Erfahrung im Kundendienst/Service

Kunden- und Serviceorientierung

Verantwortungsbewusste, strukturierte und flexible Arbeitsweise

Sehr gute Englischkenntnisse


Herzlich willkommen in einem internationalen Konzernumfeld mit vielfältigen Aufgaben, denen Sie sich kreativ und eigenverantwortlich widmen können.

Innerhalb unserer globalen Organisation ist OneRotork einer der Leitsätze und spiegelt das zielgerichtete Miteinander in globalen Projekten und lokalen Wachstumsstrategien wieder.

Neben einer umfassenden Einarbeitung gehören dazu auch vielfältige Weiterbildungen, individuell auf Ihre Talente und Ambitionen zugeschnitten.

Sie erwartet bei uns ein attraktives Gehalt, ein Dienstwagen (auch zur privaten Nutzung) und zusätzliche Benefits wie eine am Unternehmenserfolg orientierte Bonuszahlung und Mitarbeiterrabatte.

Unsere gut ausgebildeten, hoch motivierten Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter sind die Stütze unseres langjährigen Erfolges.

Werden Sie jetzt Teil davon und senden Sie uns Ihre Bewerbung inklusive Gehaltsvorstellung und frühstem Eintrittstermin an karriere@rotork.com.

Unser Human Resources Manager Frau Maja Richter-Elle freut sich auf Ihre Bewerbung.

To apply for this role, please submit your up to date CV.

About Rotork

Rotork is the market-leading global flow control and instrumentation company, helping our customers manage the flow of liquids, gases and powders across many industries worldwide.

Our purpose is Keeping the World Flowing for Future Generations.

For over sixty years, the world has relied on us to create the things that keep everything moving. From oil and gas to water and shipping, pharmaceuticals and food- these are the flows on which our modern world depends.

Today we're respected and admired for our people, performance and products. Our success flows from our commitment to engineering excellence, and that's what we will always pursue, safely and sustainably.

Rotork is going through an exciting period of change and growth, building on our existing market success. It's a great time to join us and make an impact in shaping the future of our business.

Description:
Overview:
IDC is seeking part-time Data Analytics Engineer who will join our newly established Data Analytics team based in Prague, Czech Republic. In this role you will leverage the most modern cloud solutions to collect, import, load, clean, integrate and process data from numerous diverse big datasets. You will help to design and build new data platform which will enable a completely new product. That will assist technology vendors to effectively assess their markets, customers, and competitors.

Why IDC?
IDC is the most respected global technology market research firm. We are changing the way the world thinks about the impact of technology on business and society. Our people, data, and analytics create global technology insights that accelerate customer success.

Description:
Brno, Prague
Hello, we are Meiro
In Meiro, through our product – a Customer Data Platform (CDP) – and thanks to years of our know-how, we solve the fragmentation of customer data for companies all over the world. CDP gives access to organized, clean, and stitched customer data from multiple data sources. The strength of CDP is its ability to integrate any data source in and out of CDP. The data are collected, consolidated, cleaned and ready to be used in other systems and tools.
Our headquarters is in Singapore with part of our team. The rest of us are based between Brno and Prague. You could find our clients in Australia, Southeast Asia, Central Europe, or Scandinavia.

‍

We’re looking for an energetic, skilled data engineer to join our team and work with us on our marketing solutions platform. You will play an important role in the development of the new ScanmarQED cloud-based data platform, develop scalable applications and work side-by-side with the team to create new solutions, test your own ideas and share your knowledge.
You will report to the Data Engineering lead, and support the team by working from our office in Prague (CZ) or our office in Houten (NL). You love working with the latest technologies, are capable of abstract thinking, and have good problem-solving and communication skills. If you can create tools that enable businesses to achieve the next growth stage and you get energized by doing this, we would like you to be part of our team!
About Us

We’re looking for an energetic, skilled data engineer to join our team and work with us on our marketing solutions platform. You will play an important role in the development of the new ScanmarQED cloud-based data platform, develop scalable applications and work side-by-side with the team to create new solutions, test your own ideas and share your knowledge.
You will report to the Data Engineering lead, and support the team by working from our office in Prague (CZ) or our office in Houten (NL). We are looking for an individual who would describe themselves as someone who loves working with the latest technologies, is capable of abstract thinking and has good problem solving and communication skills. If you can create tools that enable the business to achieve the next growth stage and you get energized by doing this, we would like you to be part of our team!

Description:
Summary
Posted: Mar 19, 2023
Weekly Hours: 40
Role Number:200466507
Are you a big-picture thinker who loves setting ambitious goals? Do you have a passion for understanding how each line of code affects all the others? In the Core Operating Systems group, you’ll ensure the OS is inseparable from each device’s identity as a whole. That’s because this group is committed to building fully integrated operating systems that combine hardware, software, and apps into a single Apple experience. Your dedication to cross-disciplinary collaboration will help develop groundbreaking technologies, such as iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS. By crafting these distinct, holistic user experiences, you’ll continue to uphold and advance the excellence people expect from Apple devices. The Platform Services & Operations team in Core OS is looking for a Full Stack Software Development Engineer to lead the architecture and development of essential workflow tooling at scale. The Workflow Engineering team enable teams to deliver high quality software through best in class engineering experiences, efficient workflow, data driven insights, and a culture of continuous improvement. Your focus is building a services platform that enables visualization of data across the organization in user intuitive and configurable formats.

SentinelOne is defining the future of cybersecurity through our XDR platform that automatically prevents, detects, and responds to threats in real-time. We are a values-driven team where names are known, results are rewarded, and friendships are formed. Trust, accountability, relentlessness, ingenuity, and OneSentinel define the pillars of our collaborative and unified global culture. We're looking for people that will drive team success and collaboration across SentinelOne. If you're enthusiastic about innovative approaches to problem-solving, we would love to speak with you about joining our team!

Description:
At our company we design and deliver smart control solutions for distributed power generation and energy management that empower the world's transition to sustainable energy. By combining our expertise, innovative mindset, and new technologies, we build highly flexible, intuitive, and scalable solutions for smart energy management, renewable energies, gas and diesel gen-sets, cogeneration units, marine and dual-fuel systems.
Your main responsibilities will be:
The turn-key projects (inspection, installation, commissioning, configuration of ComAp control systems including PLC algorithms) in CEE region as well as West Europe with focus on data centre projects
Support of our customers from technical point of view (service trips, trainings, help with configuration for pilot projects etc.)

NTT is a leading global IT solutions and services organisation that brings together people, data and things to create a better and more sustainable future.
In today’s ‘iNTTerconnected’ world, connections matter more now than ever. By bringing together talented people, world-class technology partners and emerging innovators, we help our clients solve some of the world’s most significant technological, business and societal challenges.
With people at the heart of our success, NTT is committed to attracting and growing the best talent and providing an environment where everyone feels they can belong and their contribution matters.

Want to be a part of our team?
The primary responsibility of Support Engineers is to provide a service to internal clients to ensure that the IT infrastructure and systems remain operational through proactively identifying, investigating and resolving technical incidents and problems and to restore service to end users by managing incidents to resolution. The Support Engineer L1 focuses on first line support for standard and low complexity incidents, requests, problems and events.

Description:
Company Description

We Dream. We Do. We Deliver.
As a full-service, data-driven customer experience transformation, we partner with Top 500 companies in the DACH region and in Eastern Europe.

Description:
Processand is a global leader in process mining implementations and consulting services using Celonis Process Mining Technology and our own highly acclaimed Machine Learning Algorithms. Our forward-thinking and dynamic way of working makes us unique to our customers.

We are a young, upbeat and rapidly growing data analytics company based in Munich (Germany) with offices in Taiwan and the US. We can offer you an extremely exciting work environment and an opportunity to gain insights into some of the largest companies in the world with whom we work very closely.

Prague is where we are heading next, and you could join our dynamic and international team of data analysts and process mining architects! If you love analyzing data and are eager to work with some of the biggest enterprises on the market, you will fit right in at Processand.

Tasks

As a Data Analyst and Process Mining Architect you will be responsible for driving projects that focus on bringing transparency and added-value to our customers' digital business processes. You will focus on generating meaningful and innovative solutions to improve the most critical metrics that keep our customers ahead of the competition. This role requires a deep understanding of our customers' needs and an ability to communicate our solutions to key decision makers and senior management. Additionally, you will support Processand's international expansion and the development of our team by working on new strategic concepts.

Requirements

Benefits

Just send us your application including your cover letter, CV and certificates. Please include the earliest starting date and your salary expectation!
You must be eligible to work in Czech Republic on an unlimited basis to be considered for this job.

We are looking forward to getting to know you.

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer Junior would be to help the team with covering service tickets and incidents. This will give you a good understanding of the typical issues and how our applications work. Later on you will be participating on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support.

Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Be curious
Willingness to learn new things
Basic knowledge of Big Data technologies (Cloudera, Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
Basic knowledge of any JVM programming language (Java, Scala)
Nice to have

Experience with Hadoop (Cloudera distribution) and Kafka
Knowledge of RDBMS
Experience with SQL
Knowledge of GitLab and CI/CD pipelines
Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding

Join our EmbedIT family and enjoy

Easily negotiable flexi office
Motivating yearly bonuses
5 weeks of paid vacation

Meal allowances

Description:
Hi! - We are ShipMonk, and we provide logistics services in order fulfillment. Our main business is in the USA, but our modern platform is built by Research & Development team in Prague.

Here at ShipMonk, we process up to 100,000 orders per day in our peak season. Our book of business has more than 1,500 clients which are small and medium e-shops, mostly based in the US. We offer the ShipMonk platform as the solution for the whole process. It covers everything from stocking the items to shipping the ready packages to all corners of the world!

About us:
We process up to 100,000 orders per day in high season
Our book of business has more than 1500 clients (fast-growing direct-to-consumer brands). We offer the ShipMonk platform as the solution for the whole process. It covers everything from stocking the items to shipping the ready packages to all corners of the world.

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with!

Our BI team has responsibilities for the operation of big data platforms and other supportive platforms used in BI domain. For example, we install Hadoop clusters, extend HW, implement new supportive BI tools and subsequently our team maintain, support, update, patch, security, and monitor these platform and tools.

We work with various tools and technologies. Our administrators make their life easier with Ansible. We support physical and virtual servers usually running on OS Linux.

Our business partners are from the headquarters of Home Credit International placed in Prague and Home Credits in countries (India, Indonesia, Philippines, and Vietnam). The team is distributed between two locations - Prague and Brno.

Your future role

Your primary responsibility as a Big Data DevOps Engineer will be to provide BigData platform maintenance, automation, development, operations, monitoring and product support from an infrastructure and operational perspective. Prioritizes working with code and using it as a tool during product development, instead of performing tasks manually.

Not a stranger to continuous integration, pipelines, virtualization technologies, containers etc.

Has a passion for product built. Participate in design and automation improvements to continuously improve production and non-production environment. Opportunities participate on projects.

Your experience and skills
Good knowledge of Linux
Basic knowledge of Python & Bash scripting
Knowledge of working with versioning tool (Github)
Basic knowledge of SQL & Databases
Problem-solving attitude
Collaborative team spirit
Willingness to learn new things
Nice to have

Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding.
Knowledge of configuration management tools (Ansible, …)
Understanding of CI/CD tools and processes (Gitlab pipelines)
Experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role

Description:
Industrial and Systems Engineer
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our global Robotics Manufacturing Centre (EDP - Engineering Delivery Platform) in Mosnov to expand our existing team as "Industrial and Systems Engineer". In this position you will be part of a global unit that is focused on the production of robotic workstations. Within this role you will be expected to set up processes and the overall system. You will be the point of contact in case a material request, for example, is generated incorrectly. Your task will then be to resolve such a problem. You will also be responsible for designing system measures. You will also be responsible for change management. The system is now partially running, but your task will be to tighten it up and further improve and maintain it in cooperation with your Swedish colleagues. Are you interested in such a challenge? Is this area close to your heart? If so, please get in touch. Description:
Základní kvalifikace:
Být absolventem/absolventkou střední nebo vyšší odborné školy s IT specializací nebo specializací v příbuzném oboru nebo odborné pracovní zkušenosti v oboru.
Znalost počítačů (hardwaru i softwaru) a ochota učit se novým technologiím a dovednostem.
Prokázaná předchozí zkušenost se zlepšováním stávajících procesů a postupů při poskytování prvotřídních služeb.
Předchozí zkušenost se spoluprací s různorodými týmy.
Zákaznicky orientovaný přístup s prokazatelnou historií.
Znalost českého jazyka.
Popis práce
V Amazonu aspirujeme být společností nejvíce zaměřenou na zákazníky na světě, kde zákazníci mohou najít, objevit a nakoupit on-line vše, co chtějí. Najímáme ty nejchytřejší a nabízíme jim prostředí, ve kterém mohou neúnavně zlepšovat možnosti pro naše zákazníky a tím jejich zkušenosti s našimi službami.
Inovace a kreativita jsou jádrem společnosti a jsou podporovány na všech úrovních našich zaměstnanců. Každý den řešíme složité technické a obchodní problémy pomocí vynalézavosti a zjednodušování. Vytváříme historii a dobrou zprávou je, že jsme teprve na začátku.
Jako IT Technik / IT Engineer budete reportovat IT Manažerovi ve vašem domovském distribučním centru a budete zodpovědní za přímou podporu lidí pracujících v provozním týmu. Takto budete bezprostředně podporovat ty, kteří přímo umožňují doručení zakoupených položek zákazníkům. Budete spolupracovat s různými odděleními, kterým vy a vaši kolegové poskytnete prvotřídní IT podporu. Budete klíčovou součástí různorodého týmu, ve kterém budete přinášet vysoce kvalitní výsledky a vždy hledat zlepšení.
Nejedná se o tradiční kancelářskou roli, budete sídlit v srdci našeho distribučního centra a pracovat na směny, a to buď 8 hodin v pěti dnech v týdnu nebo 10 hodin ve čtyřech dnech v týdnu.
Chcete-li se dozvědět více o provozu Amazonu a vidět, jak fungují naše distribuční centra, podívejte se na krátké video nebo se zúčastněte živé virtuální prohlídky. Video s titulky: https://www.amazon.com/videotour
Co dělá tento tým skvělým místem pro práci?
Benefity
Key job responsibilities


Budete poskytovat podporu 1. a 2. úrovně (přes tiketový systém), která zajišťuje, že veškeré IT vybavení a infrastruktura běží na optimální výkon a že jsou plněny všechny klíčové ukazatele (KPI) a úroveň služeb (SLA) ve vašem distribučním centru a také v jakémkoliv vzdáleném centru, které Vy a Váš tým podporujete.



Preferovaná kvalifikace
Vezměte prosím na vědomí, že nemusíte splňovat všechny výše uvedené požadavky; jakákoli kombinace je vítána!

Amazon se zavazuje k zajištění rovných pracovních příležitostí pro všechny uchazeče. Pevně věříme, že nábor zaměstnanců s různými dovednostmi je základem našeho úspěchu. Při náboru se rozhodujeme na základě vašich zkušeností a dovedností. Ceníme si vaší vášně objevovat, vymýšlet, zjednodušovat a budovat.
Ochrana vašeho soukromí a bezpečnost vašich dat je pro Amazon dlouhodobě nejvyšší prioritou. Přečtěte si prosím naše Oznámení o ochraně osobních údajů, kde se dozvíte více o tom, jak shromažďujeme, používáme a přenášíme osobní údaje našich kandidátů.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Benefits

Brno

Description:
As a data engineer in Databreakers you will be developing intelligence of our products. Your algorithms will improve automatic decision making process based on data better than any human ever could. We are improving the world of online content for millions of users via web/email/app environment personalization. Instead of same page for everyone content is tailored precisely for every single user, so millions of different pages and marketing campaigns can automatically transform according to user’s preferences leaving annoying adds behind and become a useful & effective service.
You will be designing data driven solutions for our customers like Makro / Alza / Mall / Škoda Auto / PPF / O2 and you’ll be creating general algorithms for our own products using data of our partners as Facebook or Google.
Everything you’ll be doing while working with us will immediately influence millions users and we can easily test our models performance real-time through AB tests with just one click.
APPLY NOW

DSS/ Field Services Engineer

Scope of the role
Deskside engineers provide Level 2 support for the desktop environment including responsibility for deployment of Desktop/Laptop and when applicable physical server/network equipment installation, configuration, application installation, troubleshooting, incident and request handling.

Key Responsibilities:

Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 185 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Description:
The Future Is What We Make It.

When you join Honeywell, you become a member of our Global team of thinkers, innovators, dreamers and doers who make the things that make the future.

By changing the way we fly, fueling jets in an eco-friendly way, keeping buildings smart and safe and even making it possible to breathe on Mars.

Make the Best You.

Working at Honeywell is not just about developing cool things. All our employees enjoy access to dynamic career opportunities across different fields and industries.

Join us and Make an Impact.

Use your extensive subject matter expertise to influence customers toward Honeywell solutions. As Sr. Application Sales Engineer you will provide primary technical pre-sales support to Honeywell Building Management Systems (BMS) partners and/or Customers in the Eastern Europe area. You will provide both external and internal consultations, and will help Honeywell teams develop and maintain the right product messaging, customer support, and training. You will foster cross-functional alignment to customer needs. You will participate in pursuit strategy planning and consult prospective users on product capability. You may provide valuable input for product development.

Tasks

Requirements

We Value

Benefits

If this is your dream role, then we'd love to hear from you.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform crucial job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.

Description:
About Us:
SentinelOne is defining the future of cybersecurity through our XDR platform that automatically prevents, detects, and responds to threats in real-time. We are a values-driven team where names are known, results are rewarded, and friendships are formed. Trust, accountability, relentlessness, ingenuity, and OneSentinel define the pillars of our collaborative and unified global culture. We're looking for people that will drive team success and collaboration across SentinelOne. Description:
Do našeho přátelského týmu pro divizi TRADING v Praze hledáme nového kolegu/ kolegyni na pozici:
Data Engineer/Scientist
Co má na starosti náš Research & Development tým:
V rámci divize TRADING je naším úkolem rozvoj algoritmického obchodování. Působíme na komoditních trzích, kde těžíme z podpory našeho ostříleného tradingového týmu. Podařilo se nám úspěšně implementovat několik zajímavých strategií na spotových trzích s elektřinou, nyní se posouváme na forwardové trhy a potřebujeme posílit analytický tým. Vše běží na interní k8s platformě. Naše práce je o analýze časových řad a následném prototypování, proto jednoznačně preferujeme Python

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer Junior would be to help the team with covering service tickets and incidents. This will give you a good understanding of the typical issues and how our applications work. Later on you will be participating on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support.

Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Be curious
Willingness to learn new things
Basic knowledge of Big Data technologies (Cloudera, Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
Basic knowledge of any JVM programming language (Java, Scala)
Nice to have

Description:
About Us:
SentinelOne is defining the future of cybersecurity through our XDR platform that automatically prevents, detects, and responds to threats in real-time. Singularity XDR ingests data and leverages our patented AI models to deliver autonomous protection. With SentinelOne, organizations gain full transparency into everything happening across the network at machine speed – to defeat every attack, at every stage of the threat lifecycle.
We are a values-driven team where names are known, results are rewarded, and friendships are formed. Trust, accountability, relentlessness, ingenuity, and OneSentinel define the pillars of our collaborative and unified global culture. We're looking for people that will drive team success and collaboration across SentinelOne. If you're enthusiastic about innovative approaches to problem-solving, we would love to speak with you about joining our team!

Description:
Production and Process Quality Engineer
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our global robotics manufacturing centre (EDP - Engineering Delivery Platform) in Mosnov to expand our existing team as a "Manufacturing and Process Quality Engineer". In this position, you will be part of a global unit that is focused on the production of robotic workstations. This position is associated with the development of the quality management system across the organisation, including setting up processes and communication channels. As part of this position, you will be an active member and mentor in quality training and creating company culture. To learn more about our global robotics manufacturing hub (EDP - Engineering Delivery Platform), click on the link below: https://new.abb.com/news/cs/detail/65171/abb-zvysuje-udrzitelnost-vyroby-pomoci-recyklace-a-repase-tisicu-starych-robotu This is a Production and Process Quality Engineer, reporting to the Local HRBP.

Description:
Would you like to make a difference to the environment? Do you want to work for a global and ethical company? Join us and help us provide energy-efficient solutions that make a real impact. We make what matters work. To find out more about us check: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=baa_aiJ4L7E
Short Description
Eaton is looking for an experienced Senior Test Engineer, who will become part of the Eaton European Innovation Center in Roztoky, Czech Republic. Our team focused on development new technologies for clean transportation is currently building several testing facilities for evaluation of future product concepts in the field of hydrogen combustion, fuel cell, and battery electric powertrains. Together with your colleagues from different technology fields and from various countries, you will utilize your experience and expertise to solve novel problems in a modern test cell environment. Being responsible for the test facility development from the early stage, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of HW testing at Eaton with global impact.

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with!

Our BI team has responsibilities for the operation of big data platforms and other supportive platforms used in BI domain. For example, we install Hadoop clusters, extend HW, implement new supportive BI tools and subsequently our team maintain, support, update, patch, security, and monitor these platform and tools.

We work with various tools and technologies. Our administrators make their life easier with Ansible. We support physical and virtual servers usually running on OS Linux.

Our business partners are from the headquarters of Home Credit International placed in Prague and Home Credits in countries (India, Indonesia, Philippines, and Vietnam). The team is distributed between two locations - Prague and Brno.

Your future role

Your primary responsibility as a Big Data DevOps Engineer will be to provide BigData platform maintenance, automation, development, operations, monitoring and product support from an infrastructure and operational perspective. Prioritizes working with code and using it as a tool during product development, instead of performing tasks manually.

Not a stranger to continuous integration, pipelines, virtualization technologies, containers etc.

Has a passion for product built. Participate in design and automation improvements to continuously improve production and non-production environment. Opportunities participate on projects.

Your experience and skills
Good knowledge of Linux
Basic knowledge of Python & Bash scripting
Knowledge of working with versioning tool (Github)
Basic knowledge of SQL & Databases
Problem-solving attitude
Collaborative team spirit
Willingness to learn new things
Nice to have

Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding.
Knowledge of configuration management tools (Ansible, …)
Understanding of CI/CD tools and processes (Gitlab pipelines)
Experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role

Join our EmbedIT family and enjoy

Easily negotiable flexi office
Motivating yearly bonuses
5 weeks of paid vacation
5 days Personal time off
Meal allowances
Contribution to pension scheme
Possible foreign business trips
Complimentary tea, subsidised coffee, free fruit on Mondays and Wednesdays
Relax room & games room
Technical trainings and certificates of your choice
Attendance at local & foreign conferences
Soft-skills and managerial trainings
Possible internal growth

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Internship - Software Engineer - Platform

Part time paid job for students with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

Position Description:

To expand our DevOps team, we are looking for a person who will be involved in customer application

Supporting a portfolio of applications focused on energy markets
Resolving incidents and issues.
Communicating with the customer
Preparing technical specifications and documentation








#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Description:
Industrial and Systems Engineer
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our global Robotics Manufacturing Centre (EDP - Engineering Delivery Platform) in Mosnov to expand our existing team as "Industrial and Systems Engineer". In this position you will be part of a global unit that is focused on the production of robotic workstations. Within this role you will be expected to set up processes and the overall system. You will be the point of contact in case a material request, for example, is generated incorrectly. Your task will then be to resolve such a problem. You will also be responsible for designing system measures. You will also be responsible for change management. The system is now partially running, but your task will be to tighten it up and further improve and maintain it in cooperation with your Swedish colleagues. Are you interested in such a challenge? Is this area close to your heart? If so, please get in touch. For more information about us: https://new.abb.com/news/cs/detail/65171/abb-zvysuje-udrzitelnost-vyroby-pomoci-recyklace-a-repase-tisicu-starych-robotu

Description:
Location:
Brno, Jihomoravský kraj, Czechia
Job ID:
CZ54215214
Date Posted:
2023-03-29
Company Name:
Hitachi Energy Czech Republic S.R.O.
Profession (Job Category):
Engineering & Science
Job Schedule:
Full time
Remote:
No
General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! V dnesni dobe muzeme nabidnou i urcitou jistotu zamestnani - objednavky mame na vice nez 3 roky dopredu.
Responsibilities: CO VAS V TETO ROLI CEKA? Navrh technickeho reseni na zaklade pozadavku zakaznika Priprava vykresove dokumentace pro nabidky a vyberova rizeni Projektovani ve 2D i 3D Zpracovani nakladovych kalkulaci k nabizenym projektum Kazdodenni uzka spoluprace se Svycarskym obchodnim oddelenim v anglickem jazyce Navhry zlepsovani procesu v ramci oddeleni.
Your background: PREDPOKLADY PRO VYKON TETO PRACE: VS elektrotechnickeho nebo strojniho zamereni Lepsi uzivatelska znalost prace na PC: MS Office, AutoCAD (Creo vyhodou) Znalost anglickeho jazyka na B2 prevazne pro pisemnou i ustni komunikaci se Svycarskem Selsky rozum a schopnost videt jednotlive ukoly i v sirsim kontextu Snaha ziskavat relevantni informace, spolupracovat s kolegy a dotahovat svoje ukoly do uspesneho konce a vcas. Vyhodou znalost programovani CO VAM NABIZIME: Praci na zajimavych a jedinecnych projektech do celeho sveta. Firemni kulturu postavenou na lidskych hodno-tach, vzajemnem respektu, poctivosti, kooperaci a hledani smysluplnych a efektivnich reseni. Jistotu uspesne globalni firmy v oblasti energie, ktera ma budoucnost (na dalsi 3 roky mame zajistene zakazky) Dobrou dopravni dostupnost, parkovani zdarma. Pracovi smlouvu na dobu 1 roku (v pripade spokojenosti obou stran je zvykem smlouvu prodlouzit na dobu neurcitou) 5 tydnu dovolene 7,5 hodin pruzne pracovni doby Dotovane stravovani v zavodni jidelne/stravenky Cafeteria system (moznost vyuzit nasbirane body v oblasti vzdelani, sportu nebo jinych volnocasovych aktivit) ve vysi 6 000 Kc rocne. Prispevek na penzijni pripojisteni 2-3 % ze mzdy. Mobilni SIM karty se zvyhodnenym pausalem. Odmeny za odpracovane roky a take pri odchodu do duchodu a dalsi benefity. Tesim se na Vase zivotopisy

Základní kvalifikace:
Být absolventem/absolventkou střední nebo vyšší odborné školy s IT specializací nebo specializací v příbuzném oboru nebo odborné pracovní zkušenosti v oboru.
Znalost počítačů (hardwaru i softwaru) a ochota učit se novým technologiím a dovednostem.
Prokázaná předchozí zkušenost se zlepšováním stávajících procesů a postupů při poskytování prvotřídních služeb.
Předchozí zkušenost se spoluprací s různorodými týmy.
Zákaznicky orientovaný přístup s prokazatelnou historií.
Znalost českého jazyka.
Popis práce
V Amazonu aspirujeme být společností nejvíce zaměřenou na zákazníky na světě, kde zákazníci mohou najít, objevit a nakoupit on-line vše, co chtějí. Najímáme ty nejchytřejší a nabízíme jim prostředí, ve kterém mohou neúnavně zlepšovat možnosti pro naše zákazníky a tím jejich zkušenosti s našimi službami.
Inovace a kreativita jsou jádrem společnosti a jsou podporovány na všech úrovních našich zaměstnanců. Každý den řešíme složité technické a obchodní problémy pomocí vynalézavosti a zjednodušování. Vytváříme historii a dobrou zprávou je, že jsme teprve na začátku.
Jako IT Technik / IT Engineer budete reportovat IT Manažerovi ve vašem domovském distribučním centru a budete zodpovědní za přímou podporu lidí pracujících v provozním týmu. Takto budete bezprostředně podporovat ty, kteří přímo umožňují doručení zakoupených položek zákazníkům. Budete spolupracovat s různými odděleními, kterým vy a vaši kolegové poskytnete prvotřídní IT podporu. Budete klíčovou součástí různorodého týmu, ve kterém budete přinášet vysoce kvalitní výsledky a vždy hledat zlepšení.
Nejedná se o tradiční kancelářskou roli, budete sídlit v srdci našeho distribučního centra a pracovat na směny, a to buď 8 hodin v pěti dnech v týdnu nebo 10 hodin ve čtyřech dnech v týdnu.
Chcete-li se dozvědět více o provozu Amazonu a vidět, jak fungují naše distribuční centra, podívejte se na krátké video nebo se zúčastněte živé virtuální prohlídky. Video s titulky: https://www.amazon.com/videotour
Co dělá tento tým skvělým místem pro práci?
Benefity
Key job responsibilities


Budete poskytovat podporu 1. a 2. úrovně (přes tiketový systém), která zajišťuje, že veškeré IT vybavení a infrastruktura běží na optimální výkon a že jsou plněny všechny klíčové ukazatele (KPI) a úroveň služeb (SLA) ve vašem distribučním centru a také v jakémkoliv vzdáleném centru, které Vy a Váš tým podporujete.



Preferovaná kvalifikace
Vezměte prosím na vědomí, že nemusíte splňovat všechny výše uvedené požadavky; jakákoli kombinace je vítána!

Amazon se zavazuje k zajištění rovných pracovních příležitostí pro všechny uchazeče. Pevně věříme, že nábor zaměstnanců s různými dovednostmi je základem našeho úspěchu. Při náboru se rozhodujeme na základě vašich zkušeností a dovedností. Ceníme si vaší vášně objevovat, vymýšlet, zjednodušovat a budovat.
Ochrana vašeho soukromí a bezpečnost vašich dat je pro Amazon dlouhodobě nejvyšší prioritou. Přečtěte si prosím naše Oznámení o ochraně osobních údajů, kde se dozvíte více o tom, jak shromažďujeme, používáme a přenášíme osobní údaje našich kandidátů.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.
Specific Role Responsibilities
Working with Internal and Client SME resource to provide complex data mapping solutions in line with Client requirements, FNZ Solution and FNZ Migration SDLC
Producing technical migration outputs, such as data models, data mapping definitions and data validation rules in line with the target FNZ Product and Client Migration requirements

Description:

Description:
Application Engineer - suitable for graduates
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our Robotics Division to expand our existing team as an Application Engineer. Your task will be to implement robotic workplace projects in various industries. Our customers are in all sectors but predominantly Automotive Tier 1. Our projects are from installation to handover and are mainly abroad, in countries like Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Russia or Israel and occasionally the Czech Republic. You can spend up to 6 months a year on these projects in total, so it's more for someone who enjoys travelling and wants to see the world. This position is suitable for experienced PLC programmers or application engineers, as well as electrical graduates who are interested in robotics and like to travel. Once you start, you don't work on projects alone, but always with more experienced colleagues to get a good grounding. For more information about our robotics division in the country, click on the link below: https://new.abb.com/products/robotics/cs Will you join us?

Description:
Trh biofarmace vykazuje vysokou míru růstu a po celém světě se budují výrobní kapacity pro výrobu vysoce kvalitních léků. V tomto náročném prostředí se skupina ZETA etablovala jako spolehlivý a globální inženýrský partner. ZETA navrhuje, staví, automatizuje a kvalifikuje systémy pro aseptické procesy výroby kapalin v biotechnologickém a farmaceutickém průmyslu. Na těchto vysoce komplexních systémech „šitých na míru“ se vyrábějí biofarmaceutické látky, jako jsou protirakovinová léčiva, inzulín, vakcíny, infuze apod. Jako mezinárodní, rychle rostoucí společnost se ZETA spoléhá především na své angažované zaměstnance.
Facility manažér
Místo výkonu práce: Moravany u Brna
Druh úvazku: Vollzeit

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:

Internship - Software Engineer - Platform

Part time paid job for students with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! V dnesni dobe muzeme nabidnou i urcitou jistotu zamestnani - objednavky mame na vice nez 3 roky dopredu.
Responsibilities: CO VAS V TETO ROLI CEKA? Navrh technickeho reseni na zaklade pozadavku zakaznika Priprava vykresove dokumentace pro nabidky a vyberova rizeni Projektovani ve 2D i 3D Zpracovani nakladovych kalkulaci k nabizenym projektum Kazdodenni uzka spoluprace se Svycarskym obchodnim oddelenim v anglickem jazyce Navhry zlepsovani procesu v ramci oddeleni.
Your background: PREDPOKLADY PRO VYKON TETO PRACE: VS elektrotechnickeho nebo strojniho zamereni Lepsi uzivatelska znalost prace na PC: MS Office, AutoCAD (Creo vyhodou) Znalost anglickeho jazyka na B2 prevazne pro pisemnou i ustni komunikaci se Svycarskem Selsky rozum a schopnost videt jednotlive ukoly i v sirsim kontextu Snaha ziskavat relevantni informace, spolupracovat s kolegy a dotahovat svoje ukoly do uspesneho konce a vcas. Vyhodou znalost programovani CO VAM NABIZIME: Praci na zajimavych a jedinecnych projektech do celeho sveta. Firemni kulturu postavenou na lidskych hodno-tach, vzajemnem respektu, poctivosti, kooperaci a hledani smysluplnych a efektivnich reseni. Jistotu uspesne globalni firmy v oblasti energie, ktera ma budoucnost (na dalsi 3 roky mame zajistene zakazky) Dobrou dopravni dostupnost, parkovani zdarma. Pracovi smlouvu na dobu 1 roku (v pripade spokojenosti obou stran je zvykem smlouvu prodlouzit na dobu neurcitou) 5 tydnu dovolene 7,5 hodin pruzne pracovni doby Dotovane stravovani v zavodni jidelne/stravenky Cafeteria system (moznost vyuzit nasbirane body v oblasti vzdelani, sportu nebo jinych volnocasovych aktivit) ve vysi 6 000 Kc rocne. Prispevek na penzijni pripojisteni 2-3 % ze mzdy. Mobilni SIM karty se zvyhodnenym pausalem. Odmeny za odpracovane roky a take pri odchodu do duchodu a dalsi benefity. Tesim se na Vase zivotopisy

Do interního evropského IT vývojového centra hledáme ML specialistu.
Chcete být profesionálem v oblasti ML technologií? Učit se a rozvíjet v oboru? Můžete se pochlubit zkušenostmi s technologiemi Keras, Pandas, TenserFlow a Scilkit? Rádi byste získali zkušenosti s řešeními, které napomáhají ve výrobě? Zajímáte se o novinky a nové trendy v oboru? Máte chuť se podílet na digitalizaci výroby v rámci Průmyslu 4.0?
Pak hledáme právě Vás.

Description:
Industrial and Systems Engineer
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our global Robotics Manufacturing Centre (EDP - Engineering Delivery Platform) in Mosnov to expand our existing team as "Industrial and Systems Engineer". In this position you will be part of a global unit that is focused on the production of robotic workstations. Within this role you will be expected to set up processes and the overall system. You will be the point of contact in case a material request, for example, is generated incorrectly. Your task will then be to resolve such a problem. You will also be responsible for designing system measures. You will also be responsible for change management. The system is now partially running, but your task will be to tighten it up and further improve and maintain it in cooperation with your Swedish colleagues. Are you interested in such a challenge? Is this area close to your heart? If so, please get in touch. For more information about us: https://new.abb.com/news/cs/detail/65171/abb-zvysuje-udrzitelnost-vyroby-pomoci-recyklace-a-repase-tisicu-starych-robotu

Description:
As the world leader in serving science, we solve the world’s toughest problems, like giving cancer patients hope, ensuring water and food are safe, helping law enforcement solve cases through forensics and most recently, serving as the largest provider of COVID-19 solutions. Our Data Science, Digital and IT careers are a unique opportunity to apply your specialized skills and advanced experience in analytics, statistics, data science, programming, information technology and more to drive our Mission of enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. It’s truly a career where your work makes a positive impact in our world. When you join Thermo Fisher Scientific, you’ll make an impact inside and outside the company on work that matters. #TechWithPurpose

Description:
Trh biofarmace vykazuje vysokou míru růstu a po celém světě se budují výrobní kapacity pro výrobu vysoce kvalitních léků. V tomto náročném prostředí se skupina ZETA etablovala jako spolehlivý a globální inženýrský partner. ZETA navrhuje, staví, automatizuje a kvalifikuje systémy pro aseptické procesy výroby kapalin v biotechnologickém a farmaceutickém průmyslu. Na těchto vysoce komplexních systémech „šitých na míru“ se vyrábějí biofarmaceutické látky, jako jsou protirakovinová léčiva, inzulín, vakcíny, infuze apod. Jako mezinárodní, rychle rostoucí společnost se ZETA spoléhá především na své angažované zaměstnance.
Facility manažér
Místo výkonu práce: Moravany u Brna
Druh úvazku: Vollzeit
Datum nástupu: As of now

Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.
Specific Role Responsibilities
Working with Internal and Client SME resource to provide complex data mapping solutions in line with Client requirements, FNZ Solution and FNZ Migration SDLC
Producing technical migration outputs, such as data models, data mapping definitions and data validation rules in line with the target FNZ Product and Client Migration requirements

Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.
The Migration Analyst Developer role requires an individual who can design and implement complex Client focused data mapping in line with the FNZ Migration SDLC.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.

This role is technical and focused on providing long term solutions. The data model and data population routines are a critical part of the migration process so accuracy and attention to detail are important characteristics.

Description:
Application Engineer - suitable for graduates
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our Robotics Division to expand our existing team as an Application Engineer. Your task will be to implement robotic workplace projects in various industries. Our customers are in all sectors but predominantly Automotive Tier 1. Our projects are from installation to handover and are mainly abroad, in countries like Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Russia or Israel and occasionally the Czech Republic. You can spend up to 6 months a year on these projects in total, so it's more for someone who enjoys travelling and wants to see the world. This position is suitable for experienced PLC programmers or application engineers, as well as electrical graduates who are interested in robotics and like to travel. Once you start, you don't work on projects alone, but always with more experienced colleagues to get a good grounding. For more information about our robotics division in the country, click on the link below: https://new.abb.com/products/robotics/cs Will you join us?

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Description:
Internship/SW Developer - part time-230000XP

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Internship - Software Engineer - Platform

Part time paid job for students with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! V dnesni dobe muzeme nabidnou i urcitou jistotu zamestnani - objednavky mame na vice nez 3 roky dopredu.
Responsibilities: CO VAS V TETO ROLI CEKA? Navrh technickeho reseni na zaklade pozadavku zakaznika Priprava vykresove dokumentace pro nabidky a vyberova rizeni Projektovani ve 2D i 3D Zpracovani nakladovych kalkulaci k nabizenym projektum Kazdodenni uzka spoluprace se Svycarskym obchodnim oddelenim v anglickem jazyce Navhry zlepsovani procesu v ramci oddeleni.
Your background: PREDPOKLADY PRO VYKON TETO PRACE: VS elektrotechnickeho nebo strojniho zamereni Lepsi uzivatelska znalost prace na PC: MS Office, AutoCAD (Creo vyhodou) Znalost anglickeho jazyka na B2 prevazne pro pisemnou i ustni komunikaci se Svycarskem Selsky rozum a schopnost videt jednotlive ukoly i v sirsim kontextu Snaha ziskavat relevantni informace, spolupracovat s kolegy a dotahovat svoje ukoly do uspesneho konce a vcas. Vyhodou znalost programovani CO VAM NABIZIME: Praci na zajimavych a jedinecnych projektech do celeho sveta. Firemni kulturu postavenou na lidskych hodno-tach, vzajemnem respektu, poctivosti, kooperaci a hledani smysluplnych a efektivnich reseni. Jistotu uspesne globalni firmy v oblasti energie, ktera ma budoucnost (na dalsi 3 roky mame zajistene zakazky) Dobrou dopravni dostupnost, parkovani zdarma. Pracovi smlouvu na dobu 1 roku (v pripade spokojenosti obou stran je zvykem smlouvu prodlouzit na dobu neurcitou) 5 tydnu dovolene 7,5 hodin pruzne pracovni doby Dotovane stravovani v zavodni jidelne/stravenky Cafeteria system (moznost vyuzit nasbirane body v oblasti vzdelani, sportu nebo jinych volnocasovych aktivit) ve vysi 6 000 Kc rocne. Prispevek na penzijni pripojisteni 2-3 % ze mzdy. Mobilni SIM karty se zvyhodnenym pausalem. Odmeny za odpracovane roky a take pri odchodu do duchodu a dalsi benefity. Tesim se na Vase zivotopisy

Trh biofarmace vykazuje vysokou míru růstu a po celém světě se budují výrobní kapacity pro výrobu vysoce kvalitních léků. V tomto náročném prostředí se skupina ZETA etablovala jako spolehlivý a globální inženýrský partner. ZETA navrhuje, staví, automatizuje a kvalifikuje systémy pro aseptické procesy výroby kapalin v biotechnologickém a farmaceutickém průmyslu. Na těchto vysoce komplexních systémech „šitých na míru“ se vyrábějí biofarmaceutické látky, jako jsou protirakovinová léčiva, inzulín, vakcíny, infuze apod. Jako mezinárodní, rychle rostoucí společnost se ZETA spoléhá především na své angažované zaměstnance.
Facility manažér
Místo výkonu práce: Moravany u Brna
Druh úvazku: Vollzeit
Datum nástupu: As of now

Description:
Would you like to make a difference to the environment? Do you want to work for a global and ethical company? Join us and help us provide energy-efficient solutions that make a real impact. We make what matters work. To find out more about us check: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=baa_aiJ4L7E
Short Description
Eaton is looking for an experienced Senior Test Engineer, who will become part of the Eaton European Innovation Center in Roztoky, Czech Republic. Our team focused on development new technologies for clean transportation is currently building several testing facilities for evaluation of future product concepts in the field of hydrogen combustion, fuel cell, and battery electric powertrains. Together with your colleagues from different technology fields and from various countries, you will utilize your experience and expertise to solve novel problems in a modern test cell environment. Being responsible for the test facility development from the early stage, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of HW testing at Eaton with global impact.

Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.
Specific Role Responsibilities
Working with Internal and Client SME resource to provide complex data mapping solutions in line with Client requirements, FNZ Solution and FNZ Migration SDLC
Producing technical migration outputs, such as data models, data mapping definitions and data validation rules in line with the target FNZ Product and Client Migration requirements

Description:
Náš tým tvoří na třicet vývojářů, datových inženýrů a datových vědců, kteří mají za sebou více jak desítku platforem Big Data postavených on premise a aktuálně se podílejí na přesunu analytických platforem do cloudu. Naše inovační projekty čítají více než 50 aplikačních a analytických řešení v oblasti Big Data a Data Science. Chceš pracovat na těch dalších? Čti dál!
Co budeš mít na starosti:
Návrh a implementaci end-to-end datových řešení na míru pro klienta včetně datové kvality, návrhu datových modelů, automatizace procesů a dalších aspektů.
Úzce spolupracovat s klientem na přípravě datové vrstvy nebo data martu.
Práci s nejmodernějšími technologiemi - např. Spark, Impala, Kafka, Cassandra a další NoSql databáze, Airflow, frameworky pro machine learning a AI, nejnovější knihovny ve Scale a Pythonu.
