Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.
The Migration Analyst Developer role requires an individual who can design and implement complex Client focused data mapping in line with the FNZ Migration SDLC.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.

This role is technical and focused on providing long term solutions. The data model and data population routines are a critical part of the migration process so accuracy and attention to detail are important characteristics.

Description:
Application Engineer - suitable for graduates
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our Robotics Division to expand our existing team as an Application Engineer. Your task will be to implement robotic workplace projects in various industries. Our customers are in all sectors but predominantly Automotive Tier 1. Our projects are from installation to handover and are mainly abroad, in countries like Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Russia or Israel and occasionally the Czech Republic. You can spend up to 6 months a year on these projects in total, so it's more for someone who enjoys travelling and wants to see the world. This position is suitable for experienced PLC programmers or application engineers, as well as electrical graduates who are interested in robotics and like to travel. Once you start, you don't work on projects alone, but always with more experienced colleagues to get a good grounding. For more information about our robotics division in the country, click on the link below: https://new.abb.com/products/robotics/cs Will you join us?

Job_title: Technical Support Engineer I with German
Description:
At Jamf, people are at the core of everything we do. We do what's right for our customers, our employees, our communities and our world. We take pride in simplifying technology for tens of thousands of customers around the globe and helping organizations succeed with Apple.

Jamf operates as a choice-based office model. Choose to work in the office, connect 100% remote from your home, or find the blend that works best for you.

What you'll do at Jamf:

Description:
Základní kvalifikace:
Být absolventem/absolventkou střední nebo vyšší odborné školy s IT specializací nebo specializací v příbuzném oboru nebo odborné pracovní zkušenosti v oboru.
Znalost počítačů (hardwaru i softwaru) a ochota učit se novým technologiím a dovednostem.
Prokázaná předchozí zkušenost se zlepšováním stávajících procesů a postupů při poskytování prvotřídních služeb.
Předchozí zkušenost se spoluprací s různorodými týmy.
Zákaznicky orientovaný přístup s prokazatelnou historií.
Znalost českého jazyka.
Popis práce
V Amazonu aspirujeme být společností nejvíce zaměřenou na zákazníky na světě, kde zákazníci mohou najít, objevit a nakoupit on-line vše, co chtějí. Najímáme ty nejchytřejší a nabízíme jim prostředí, ve kterém mohou neúnavně zlepšovat možnosti pro naše zákazníky a tím jejich zkušenosti s našimi službami.
Inovace a kreativita jsou jádrem společnosti a jsou podporovány na všech úrovních našich zaměstnanců. Každý den řešíme složité technické a obchodní problémy pomocí vynalézavosti a zjednodušování. Vytváříme historii a dobrou zprávou je, že jsme teprve na začátku.
Jako IT Technik / IT Engineer budete reportovat IT Manažerovi ve vašem domovském distribučním centru a budete zodpovědní za přímou podporu lidí pracujících v provozním týmu. Takto budete bezprostředně podporovat ty, kteří přímo umožňují doručení zakoupených položek zákazníkům. Budete spolupracovat s různými odděleními, kterým vy a vaši kolegové poskytnete prvotřídní IT podporu. Budete klíčovou součástí různorodého týmu, ve kterém budete přinášet vysoce kvalitní výsledky a vždy hledat zlepšení.
Nejedná se o tradiční kancelářskou roli, budete sídlit v srdci našeho distribučního centra a pracovat na směny, a to buď 8 hodin v pěti dnech v týdnu nebo 10 hodin ve čtyřech dnech v týdnu.
Chcete-li se dozvědět více o provozu Amazonu a vidět, jak fungují naše distribuční centra, podívejte se na krátké video nebo se zúčastněte živé virtuální prohlídky. Video s titulky: https://www.amazon.com/videotour
Co dělá tento tým skvělým místem pro práci?
Benefity
Key job responsibilities


Budete poskytovat podporu 1. a 2. úrovně (přes tiketový systém), která zajišťuje, že veškeré IT vybavení a infrastruktura běží na optimální výkon a že jsou plněny všechny klíčové ukazatele (KPI) a úroveň služeb (SLA) ve vašem distribučním centru a také v jakémkoliv vzdáleném centru, které Vy a Váš tým podporujete.



Preferovaná kvalifikace
Vezměte prosím na vědomí, že nemusíte splňovat všechny výše uvedené požadavky; jakákoli kombinace je vítána!

Amazon se zavazuje k zajištění rovných pracovních příležitostí pro všechny uchazeče. Pevně věříme, že nábor zaměstnanců s různými dovednostmi je základem našeho úspěchu. Při náboru se rozhodujeme na základě vašich zkušeností a dovedností. Ceníme si vaší vášně objevovat, vymýšlet, zjednodušovat a budovat.
Ochrana vašeho soukromí a bezpečnost vašich dat je pro Amazon dlouhodobě nejvyšší prioritou. Přečtěte si prosím naše Oznámení o ochraně osobních údajů, kde se dozvíte více o tom, jak shromažďujeme, používáme a přenášíme osobní údaje našich kandidátů.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Description:
Relocation Assistance Offered Within Region
# 152230 - Hustopece, Jihomoravský kraj, Czech Republic
Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Description:
Groupon is an experienced marketplace that brings people more ways to get the most out of their city or wherever they may be. By enabling real-time mobile commerce across local businesses, live events, and travel destinations, Groupon helps people find and discover experiences––big and small, new and familiar––that make for a full, fun, and rewarding life. Groupon helps local businesses grow and strengthen customer relationships––resulting in strong, vibrant communities. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking, and celebrates success.
Are you a passionate, energetic technology enthusiast eager to work at a rapid pace with the flexibility to work across a broad tech stack? Are you a problem solver; someone who enjoys debugging code, resolving issues, and creating solutions for exciting problems?
The Data Ingestion team at Groupon is at the heart of all things “data”, working on defining and building the next-generation cloud-based solutions to ingest and curate petabytes of data into our data lake. Our mission is to empower data analysts & data scientists across all business units to make better business decisions. This role offers a unique combination of skills in computer science (distributed systems, big data) and scalable, high-performance production systems.

Job_title: Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia
Description:
Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia (m/w/d)

Reports To: National Service Manager
Location: Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia

Read this in:
English ,
Deutsch

Area Of Interest: Service

Contact: Maja Richter-Elle
( karriere@rotork.com )

Position Summary

In Deutschland beschäftigt Rotork 160 Mitarbeiter an den vier Standorten in Hilden, Langenzenn, Melle und Sinzig. Aktuell möchten wir unser Team verstärken - am liebsten mit Ihnen:

Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia (m/w/d)


Serviceeinsätze vor Ort – im Wesentlichen Funktionsprüfung, Fehleranalyse und -erkennung, Inbetriebnahme, Reparatur, Wartung, Modifizierung, Nachrüstung und Ersatz von Antrieben im Feld

Durchführung von Inspektionen / Funktionschecks an Antrieben von Rotork

Mechanische (teilweise elektrische) Installation von Stellantrieben und zugehörigen Adaptionselementen, Sockeln und Antriebswellen

Erstellung von technischen detaillierten Protokollen je Einsatz und Auftrag

Beachtung der unterschiedlichen Standortregeln und -risiken im Hinblick auf Gesundheit und Sicherheit

Erstellung von Risikobewertungen und Überprüfung sowie Änderung in Übereinstimmung mit den Standortanforderungen

Vollumfängliche, präzise Vermessung der technischen Gegebenheiten (Aufmaß), sprich von Armaturen und Antrieben im Rahmen der Projektplanungen und -durchführung

Schulung der Kunden in Bezug auf Inbetriebnahme

Kundeninformation über unser Leistungsspektrum im Bereich Service

Umbauarbeiten, Wartungsarbeiten und Überholungsarbeiten (beispielsweise bei Raffineriestillständen)

Inbetriebnahme von elektrischen Antrieben und Steuerungseinheiten

Montage von hydraulischen, pneumatischen, elektropneumatischen und elektrohydraulischen Baugruppen für die Steuer- und Regeltechnik vor Ort (national, international) und in der Werkstatt

Modernisierung von Armaturen vor Ort

Ausarbeitungen von Aufmaßen mit den dazugehörigen Zeichnungen für die individuellen und kundenspezifischen Gegebenheiten und Vorgaben

Auslegung von Antrieben vor Ort bei unseren Kunden


Abgeschlossene technische Ausbildung mit entsprechender Qualifikation zum Arbeiten mit elektrischer Spannung und / oder Meister oder Techniker Weiterbildung in geeignetem Fachgebiet

Erfahrung im Kundendienst/Service

Kenntnisse in der Hydraulik, Pneumatik und Elektronik

Kunden- und Serviceorientierung

Verantwortungsbewusste, strukturierte und flexible Arbeitsweise

Sehr gute Englischkenntnisse


Herzlich willkommen in einem internationalen Konzernumfeld mit vielfältigen Aufgaben, denen Sie sich kreativ und eigenverantwortlich widmen können.

Innerhalb unserer globalen Organisation ist OneRotork einer der Leitsätze und spiegelt das zielgerichtete Miteinander in globalen Projekten und lokalen Wachstumsstrategien wieder.

Neben einer umfassenden Einarbeitung gehören dazu auch vielfältige Weiterbildungen, individuell auf Ihre Talente und Ambitionen zugeschnitten.

Sie erwartet bei uns ein attraktives Gehalt, ein Dienstwagen (auch zur privaten Nutzung) und zusätzliche Benefits wie eine am Unternehmenserfolg orientierte Bonuszahlung und Mitarbeiterrabatte.

Unsere gut ausgebildeten, hoch motivierten Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter sind die Stütze unseres langjährigen Erfolges.

Werden Sie jetzt Teil davon und senden Sie uns Ihre Bewerbung inklusive Gehaltsvorstellung und frühstem Eintrittstermin an karriere@rotork.com.

Unser Human Resources Manager Frau Maja Richter-Elle freut sich auf Ihre Bewerbung.

To apply for this role, please submit your up to date CV.

About Rotork

Rotork is the market-leading global flow control and instrumentation company, helping our customers manage the flow of liquids, gases and powders across many industries worldwide.

Our purpose is Keeping the World Flowing for Future Generations.

For over sixty years, the world has relied on us to create the things that keep everything moving. From oil and gas to water and shipping, pharmaceuticals and food- these are the flows on which our modern world depends.

Today we're respected and admired for our people, performance and products. Our success flows from our commitment to engineering excellence, and that's what we will always pursue, safely and sustainably.

Rotork is going through an exciting period of change and growth, building on our existing market success. It's a great time to join us and make an impact in shaping the future of our business.

Description:
About Workato
Workato is the only integration and automation platform that is as simple as it is powerful — and because it's built to power the largest enterprises, it is quite powerful.
Simultaneously, it's a low-code/no-code platform. This empowers any user (dev/non-dev) to painlessly automate workflows across any apps and databases.

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Description:
Relocation Assistance Offered Within Region
# 152230 - Hustopece, Jihomoravský kraj, Czech Republic
Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Job_title: Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia
Description:
Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia (m/w/d)

Reports To: National Service Manager
Location: Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia

Read this in:
English ,
Deutsch

Area Of Interest: Service

Contact: Maja Richter-Elle
( karriere@rotork.com )

Position Summary

In Deutschland beschäftigt Rotork 160 Mitarbeiter an den vier Standorten in Hilden, Langenzenn, Melle und Sinzig. Aktuell möchten wir unser Team verstärken - am liebsten mit Ihnen:

Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia (m/w/d)


Serviceeinsätze vor Ort – im Wesentlichen Funktionsprüfung, Fehleranalyse und -erkennung, Inbetriebnahme, Reparatur, Wartung, Modifizierung, Nachrüstung und Ersatz von Antrieben im Feld

Durchführung von Inspektionen / Funktionschecks an Antrieben von Rotork

Mechanische (teilweise elektrische) Installation von Stellantrieben und zugehörigen Adaptionselementen, Sockeln und Antriebswellen

Erstellung von technischen detaillierten Protokollen je Einsatz und Auftrag

Beachtung der unterschiedlichen Standortregeln und -risiken im Hinblick auf Gesundheit und Sicherheit

Erstellung von Risikobewertungen und Überprüfung sowie Änderung in Übereinstimmung mit den Standortanforderungen

Vollumfängliche, präzise Vermessung der technischen Gegebenheiten (Aufmaß), sprich von Armaturen und Antrieben im Rahmen der Projektplanungen und -durchführung

Schulung der Kunden in Bezug auf Inbetriebnahme

Kundeninformation über unser Leistungsspektrum im Bereich Service

Umbauarbeiten, Wartungsarbeiten und Überholungsarbeiten (beispielsweise bei Raffineriestillständen)

Inbetriebnahme von elektrischen Antrieben und Steuerungseinheiten

Montage von hydraulischen, pneumatischen, elektropneumatischen und elektrohydraulischen Baugruppen für die Steuer- und Regeltechnik vor Ort (national, international) und in der Werkstatt

Modernisierung von Armaturen vor Ort

Ausarbeitungen von Aufmaßen mit den dazugehörigen Zeichnungen für die individuellen und kundenspezifischen Gegebenheiten und Vorgaben

Auslegung von Antrieben vor Ort bei unseren Kunden


Abgeschlossene technische Ausbildung mit entsprechender Qualifikation zum Arbeiten mit elektrischer Spannung und / oder Meister oder Techniker Weiterbildung in geeignetem Fachgebiet

Erfahrung im Kundendienst/Service

Kenntnisse in der Hydraulik, Pneumatik und Elektronik

Kunden- und Serviceorientierung

Verantwortungsbewusste, strukturierte und flexible Arbeitsweise

Sehr gute Englischkenntnisse


Herzlich willkommen in einem internationalen Konzernumfeld mit vielfältigen Aufgaben, denen Sie sich kreativ und eigenverantwortlich widmen können.

Innerhalb unserer globalen Organisation ist OneRotork einer der Leitsätze und spiegelt das zielgerichtete Miteinander in globalen Projekten und lokalen Wachstumsstrategien wieder.

Neben einer umfassenden Einarbeitung gehören dazu auch vielfältige Weiterbildungen, individuell auf Ihre Talente und Ambitionen zugeschnitten.

Sie erwartet bei uns ein attraktives Gehalt, ein Dienstwagen (auch zur privaten Nutzung) und zusätzliche Benefits wie eine am Unternehmenserfolg orientierte Bonuszahlung und Mitarbeiterrabatte.

Unsere gut ausgebildeten, hoch motivierten Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter sind die Stütze unseres langjährigen Erfolges.

Werden Sie jetzt Teil davon und senden Sie uns Ihre Bewerbung inklusive Gehaltsvorstellung und frühstem Eintrittstermin an karriere@rotork.com.

Unser Human Resources Manager Frau Maja Richter-Elle freut sich auf Ihre Bewerbung.

To apply for this role, please submit your up to date CV.

About Rotork

Rotork is the market-leading global flow control and instrumentation company, helping our customers manage the flow of liquids, gases and powders across many industries worldwide.

Our purpose is Keeping the World Flowing for Future Generations.

For over sixty years, the world has relied on us to create the things that keep everything moving. From oil and gas to water and shipping, pharmaceuticals and food- these are the flows on which our modern world depends.

Today we're respected and admired for our people, performance and products. Our success flows from our commitment to engineering excellence, and that's what we will always pursue, safely and sustainably.

Rotork is going through an exciting period of change and growth, building on our existing market success. It's a great time to join us and make an impact in shaping the future of our business.

Description:
Groupon is an experienced marketplace that brings people more ways to get the most out of their city or wherever they may be. By enabling real-time mobile commerce across local businesses, live events, and travel destinations, Groupon helps people find and discover experiences––big and small, new and familiar––that make for a full, fun, and rewarding life. Groupon helps local businesses grow and strengthen customer relationships––resulting in strong, vibrant communities. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking, and celebrates success.
Are you a passionate, energetic technology enthusiast eager to work at a rapid pace with the flexibility to work across a broad tech stack? Are you a problem solver; someone who enjoys debugging code, resolving issues, and creating solutions for exciting problems?
The Data Ingestion team at Groupon is at the heart of all things “data”, working on defining and building the next-generation cloud-based solutions to ingest and curate petabytes of data into our data lake. Our mission is to empower data analysts & data scientists across all business units to make better business decisions. This role offers a unique combination of skills in computer science (distributed systems, big data) and scalable, high-performance production systems.

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Description:
O nás
Do významné mezinárodní výrobní společnosti hledáme zkušeného kandidáta na pozici:
SENIOR QUALITY ENGINEER
Náplň práce:
nastavování a udržování kvalitativních procesů u stávajících a nových projektů
aktivně komunikovat na denní bázi se zákazníky či dodavateli
vzorkování nových či stávajících dílů

O nás
Rozšiřujeme náš stávající tým a potřebujeme možná právě Vás. Jsme významná výrobní společnost, přední dodavatel v automobilovém průmyslu. Pracujeme s nejmodernějšími technologiemi, nabízíme kromě zajímavé práce vyspělou firemní kulturu a mezinárodní přátelské prostředí.

TECHNOLOG /INDUSTRIAL ENGINEER

Provádění analýz, vývoj, implementace a úpravy datových řešení a ETL procesů

Spolupráce na projektech s vývojovými týmy, datovými analytiky a dalšími kolegy
Údržba a správa databázových systémů a infrastruktury
Vývoj, implementace a optimalizace algoritmů a modelů pro naše projekty
Vyvíjení softwarových nástrojů pro automatizaci procesů a zlepšení výkonu modelů
POŽADAVKY:
Zkušenosti s programovacím jazykem Python a SQL

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Job description
As a specialist in automotive advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) applications you will be part of a strongly growing team addressing the company strategies on car digitalization, autonomous driving and software defined vehicles. Your responsibilities will consist of developing proof of concepts, product collaterals, system solutions in the field of Imaging, time-of-flight sensors and other ADAS applications. Description:
Groupon is an experienced marketplace that brings people more ways to get the most out of their city or wherever they may be. Groupon helps local businesses grow and strengthen customer relationships––resulting in strong, vibrant communities. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking, and celebrates success.
Are you a passionate, energetic technology enthusiast eager to work at a rapid pace with the flexibility to work across a broad tech stack? Are you a problem solver; someone who enjoys debugging code, resolving issues, and creating solutions for exciting problems?
The Data Ingestion team at Groupon is at the heart of all things “data”, working on defining and building the next-generation cloud-based solutions to ingest and curate petabytes of data into our data lake. Our mission is to empower data analysts & data scientists across all business units to make better business decisions. This role offers a unique combination of skills in computer science (distributed systems, big data) and scalable, high-performance production systems.

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Position Description:

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Description:
About Workato
Workato is the only integration and automation platform that is as simple as it is powerful — and because it's built to power the largest enterprises, it is quite powerful.
Simultaneously, it's a low-code/no-code platform. This empowers any user (dev/non-dev) to painlessly automate workflows across any apps and databases.
We're proud to be named a leader by both Forrester and Gartner and trusted by 7,000+ of the world's top brands such as Box, Grab, Slack, and more. But what is most exciting is that this is only the beginning.

Job_title: Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia
Description:
Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia (m/w/d)

Reports To: National Service Manager
Location: Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia

Read this in:
English ,
Deutsch

Area Of Interest: Service

Contact: Maja Richter-Elle
( karriere@rotork.com )

Position Summary

In Deutschland beschäftigt Rotork 160 Mitarbeiter an den vier Standorten in Hilden, Langenzenn, Melle und Sinzig. Aktuell möchten wir unser Team verstärken - am liebsten mit Ihnen:

Field Service Engineer Austria & Hungary & Slovakia & Czechia (m/w/d)


Serviceeinsätze vor Ort – im Wesentlichen Funktionsprüfung, Fehleranalyse und -erkennung, Inbetriebnahme, Reparatur, Wartung, Modifizierung, Nachrüstung und Ersatz von Antrieben im Feld

Durchführung von Inspektionen / Funktionschecks an Antrieben von Rotork

Mechanische (teilweise elektrische) Installation von Stellantrieben und zugehörigen Adaptionselementen, Sockeln und Antriebswellen

Erstellung von technischen detaillierten Protokollen je Einsatz und Auftrag

Beachtung der unterschiedlichen Standortregeln und -risiken im Hinblick auf Gesundheit und Sicherheit

Erstellung von Risikobewertungen und Überprüfung sowie Änderung in Übereinstimmung mit den Standortanforderungen

Vollumfängliche, präzise Vermessung der technischen Gegebenheiten (Aufmaß), sprich von Armaturen und Antrieben im Rahmen der Projektplanungen und -durchführung

Schulung der Kunden in Bezug auf Inbetriebnahme

Kundeninformation über unser Leistungsspektrum im Bereich Service

Umbauarbeiten, Wartungsarbeiten und Überholungsarbeiten (beispielsweise bei Raffineriestillständen)

Inbetriebnahme von elektrischen Antrieben und Steuerungseinheiten

Montage von hydraulischen, pneumatischen, elektropneumatischen und elektrohydraulischen Baugruppen für die Steuer- und Regeltechnik vor Ort (national, international) und in der Werkstatt

Modernisierung von Armaturen vor Ort

Ausarbeitungen von Aufmaßen mit den dazugehörigen Zeichnungen für die individuellen und kundenspezifischen Gegebenheiten und Vorgaben

Auslegung von Antrieben vor Ort bei unseren Kunden


Abgeschlossene technische Ausbildung mit entsprechender Qualifikation zum Arbeiten mit elektrischer Spannung und / oder Meister oder Techniker Weiterbildung in geeignetem Fachgebiet

Erfahrung im Kundendienst/Service

Kenntnisse in der Hydraulik, Pneumatik und Elektronik

Kunden- und Serviceorientierung

Verantwortungsbewusste, strukturierte und flexible Arbeitsweise

Sehr gute Englischkenntnisse


Herzlich willkommen in einem internationalen Konzernumfeld mit vielfältigen Aufgaben, denen Sie sich kreativ und eigenverantwortlich widmen können.

Innerhalb unserer globalen Organisation ist OneRotork einer der Leitsätze und spiegelt das zielgerichtete Miteinander in globalen Projekten und lokalen Wachstumsstrategien wieder.

Neben einer umfassenden Einarbeitung gehören dazu auch vielfältige Weiterbildungen, individuell auf Ihre Talente und Ambitionen zugeschnitten.

Sie erwartet bei uns ein attraktives Gehalt, ein Dienstwagen (auch zur privaten Nutzung) und zusätzliche Benefits wie eine am Unternehmenserfolg orientierte Bonuszahlung und Mitarbeiterrabatte.

Unsere gut ausgebildeten, hoch motivierten Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter sind die Stütze unseres langjährigen Erfolges.

Werden Sie jetzt Teil davon und senden Sie uns Ihre Bewerbung inklusive Gehaltsvorstellung und frühstem Eintrittstermin an karriere@rotork.com.

Unser Human Resources Manager Frau Maja Richter-Elle freut sich auf Ihre Bewerbung.

To apply for this role, please submit your up to date CV.

About Rotork

Rotork is the market-leading global flow control and instrumentation company, helping our customers manage the flow of liquids, gases and powders across many industries worldwide.

Our purpose is Keeping the World Flowing for Future Generations.

For over sixty years, the world has relied on us to create the things that keep everything moving. From oil and gas to water and shipping, pharmaceuticals and food- these are the flows on which our modern world depends.

Today we're respected and admired for our people, performance and products. Our success flows from our commitment to engineering excellence, and that's what we will always pursue, safely and sustainably.

Rotork is going through an exciting period of change and growth, building on our existing market success. It's a great time to join us and make an impact in shaping the future of our business.

Description:
Who are we?
The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?
We are looking for a passionate and committed Data Engineers to join the Sales & Marketing Data Domain team (FACCTS Team) to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards. As Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.You will also work together with business stakeholders to understand business requirements and challenges.

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Description:
Relocation Assistance Offered Within Region
# 152230 - Hustopece, Jihomoravský kraj, Czech Republic
Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Job_title: Automotive Application Support Engineer - Imaging EMEA M/F
Description:
Position description
Posting title
Automotive Application Support Engineer - Imaging EMEA M/F
Regular/Temporary
Regular
Job description
As a specialist in automotive advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) applications you will be part of a strongly growing team addressing the company strategies on car digitalization, autonomous driving and software defined vehicles. Your responsibilities will consist of developing proof of concepts, product collaterals, system solutions in the field of Imaging, time-of-flight sensors and other ADAS applications. You will provide best-in-class technical support to facilitate design-ins and problem resolution at our EMEA customer base. You will interact with internal and external decision makers. Description:
Groupon is an experienced marketplace that brings people more ways to get the most out of their city or wherever they may be. By enabling real-time mobile commerce across local businesses, live events, and travel destinations, Groupon helps people find and discover experiences––big and small, new and familiar––that make for a full, fun, and rewarding life. Groupon helps local businesses grow and strengthen customer relationships––resulting in strong, vibrant communities. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking, and celebrates success.
Are you a passionate, energetic technology enthusiast eager to work at a rapid pace with the flexibility to work across a broad tech stack? Are you a problem solver; someone who enjoys debugging code, resolving issues, and creating solutions for exciting problems?
The Data Ingestion team at Groupon is at the heart of all things “data”, working on defining and building the next-generation cloud-based solutions to ingest and curate petabytes of data into our data lake. Our mission is to empower data analysts & data scientists across all business units to make better business decisions. This role offers a unique combination of skills in computer science (distributed systems, big data) and scalable, high-performance production systems.

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Posting title
Automotive Application Support Engineer - Imaging EMEA M/F
Regular/Temporary
Regular
Job description
As a specialist in automotive advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) applications you will be part of a strongly growing team addressing the company strategies on car digitalization, autonomous driving and software defined vehicles. Your responsibilities will consist of developing proof of concepts, product collaterals, system solutions in the field of Imaging, time-of-flight sensors and other ADAS applications. You will provide best-in-class technical support to facilitate design-ins and problem resolution at our EMEA customer base. You will interact with internal and external decision makers. As the center of application competence, you will drive the application roadmap and strategy staying in close alignment with Regional Sales & Marketing Organizations as well as with the Product Divisions

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Benefits

Description:
Groupon is an experienced marketplace that brings people more ways to get the most out of their city or wherever they may be. By enabling real-time mobile commerce across local businesses, live events, and travel destinations, Groupon helps people find and discover experiences––big and small, new and familiar––that make for a full, fun, and rewarding life. Groupon helps local businesses grow and strengthen customer relationships––resulting in strong, vibrant communities. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking, and celebrates success.
Are you a passionate, energetic technology enthusiast eager to work at a rapid pace with the flexibility to work across a broad tech stack? Are you a problem solver; someone who enjoys debugging code, resolving issues, and creating solutions for exciting problems?
The Data Ingestion team at Groupon is at the heart of all things “data”, working on defining and building the next-generation cloud-based solutions to ingest and curate petabytes of data into our data lake. Our mission is to empower data analysts & data scientists across all business units to make better business decisions. This role offers a unique combination of skills in computer science (distributed systems, big data) and scalable, high-performance production systems.
